amendment.description: An amendment numbered 79 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease funding for the Federal Prison System by $1 million to express concern with the use of solitary confinement within the Federal Bureau of Prisons or the United States Marshals Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Omar amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Ms. Omar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Omar amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
